Member Function Documentation

BOOLEAN FtpClient::CloseDataConnection (   )  [protected]
 

Closes the data connection to the peer data socket.

Returns:
Whether the connection could be closed or not.

BOOLEAN FtpClient::DoListCmd (  const FtpRequest &  request  )  [protected, virtual]
 

Finally commits thte actions of the LIST command. It returns whether the given FTP command could be processed or not. The return value does not express the result of the operation. This is done by the FTP reply code.

Parameters:
request The FTP request message.
Returns:
Whether the command could be processed or not.

Parameters:
request The FTP request message.
Returns:
Whether the command could be processed or not.

Finally commits thte actions of the STOR command. It returns whether the given FTP command could be processed or not. The return value does not express the result of the operation. This is done by the FTP reply code.

Parameters:

Returns:

BOOLEAN FtpClient::EstablishDataConnection (   )  [protected]
 

Establishes a data connection to the peer data socket. NOTE: The method replies to the peer control socket if the connection could be established, was previously given or if it could not be created.

Returns:
Whether the connection could be established or not.

BOOLEAN FtpClient::ExecCdupCmd (  const FtpRequest &  request  )  [protected, virtual]
 

Executes CDUP command. It returns whether the given FTP command could be processed or not. The return value does not express the result of the operation. This is done by the FTP reply code.

Returns:

BOOLEAN FtpClient::ExecCmd (  const FtpRequest &  request  )  [protected, virtual]
 

Executes an FTP command. It returns whether the given FTP command could be processed or not. The return value does not express the result of the operation. This is done by the FTP reply code.

Parameters:
request The FTP request message.
Returns:
Whether the command could be processed or not.

AuthProvider *  ftpAuthProvider
)  [protected, virtual]

Pathname FtpClient::GetAbsolutePathname (  const Pathname &  pathname  )  [protected]
 

Converts the given user home absolute path name to an absolute path name in the RFS. The result depends on the specified user home directory.

Parameters:
pathname path name absolute to user home
Returns:
path name absolute to RFS root

BOOLEAN FtpClient::ReplyMessage (  const String &  replyCode,
const String &  text
)  [protected]
 

Replies a code and text message to the client's control socket.

Parameters:
replyCode The number of the reply code (1xx, 2xx, 3xx, 4xx, 5xx).
text The (optional) text describing the cause or additional information about the replay code.
Returns:
Reply sent correctly.
